mapper.select: select stadiumSeq, stadiumName, stadiumAddr, stadiumManagerName, stadiumRegDate, stadiumModDate, stadiumDelNY from stadium
select stadiumSeq, stadiumName, stadiumAddr, stadiumManagerName, stadiumRegDate, stadiumModDate, stadiumDelNY from stadium where 1=1 and stadiumSeq=#{stadiumSeq}
mapper.insert: insert into stadium ( stadiumName, stadiumAddr, stadiumManagerName, stadiumRegDate, stadiumModDate, stadiumDelNY ) values ( #{stadiumName}, #{stadiumAddr}, #{stadiumManagerName}, now(), now(), #{stadiumDelNY}
mapper.update: update stadium set stadiumName=#{stadiumName}, stadiumAddr=#{stadiumAddr}, stadiumManagerName=#{stadiumManagerName}, stadiumModDate=now(), stadiumDelNY=#{stadiumDelNY} where 1=1 and stadiumSeq=#{stadiumSeq}
update stadium set stadiumDelNY=1 where 1=1 and stadiumSeq=#{stadiumSeq}
